name: Hazard Lab -- 3D Platformer
description:
Three significant modifications 1) Design Modifications
  • All 3 levels are unique and coherent in shape of MSU.
    • First Level -- M
    • Second Level -- S
    • Third Level -- U
    • Official Unity Particle Pack is used for various effects.
  • All levels have custom music in background
    • Royalty free music is used from Chosic 
    • Following sound effects are used from YouTube
      • Eath-quake
      • Gas Leakage
      • Fire
2) Aesthetic modifications (MSU Green Theme)
  • UI theme is completely changed (Green MSU theme)
    • Fonts, UI menu and button theme is changed.
    • All buttons and panel have new sprites.
    • In-Game UI is also updated
    • Spartan 2D sprites are used
  • All 3 levels have different SKYBOXES. 
3) Gameplay Modifications
  • New Speed Up power up is added (New Script added)
  • New particle effects are used
  • Damage is assigned to particle effects
  • New animations are created
